name: [Phenomena] BloodRed dupioni demicup corset Sample Sale
description: Size 6 US Red silk dupioni demicup corset with external boning channels Fully boned with a mix of 1/2" flat & spiral steel with front busk closure & back lacing for adjustment. Created in 2009, worn several times in photo shoots & fashion shows. Shows some minor signs of wear. Had marks from deodorant in underarm area that have been removed using net abrasion. Price has been significantly reduced due to the above. Comes with back lacing protector & 6' of black cotton flat lacing. Stored in a closet away from pets & cigarette smoke. ***Details*** Fabric: External: Deep red silk dupioni Lining: Burgundy batik print cotton broadcloth Strength layer: 100% German cotton herringbone coutil Inside: - 1/2" steel front busk closure - (8) 1/2" flat steel bones - (4) 1/2" spiral steel bones at bust - (14) size 0 grommets & washers for back lacing, set with 1/4" boning - Attached back lacing protector also lined with matching batik print lining, accented with 4 grommets at waist for proper alignment. **Note** For best fit, your measurements should be 2" larger than the below bust & hip measurements, & 2-4" larger than waist. Though it is very sturdily constructed, for your own safety please do NOT use this or any other non-custom corset for tightlacing as you can cause yourself serious harm. This item is for short-term wear only. You have been warned. ***Measurements *** Bust - 34-36 B-C Waist - 20" Hip - 36" More measurements can be provided .

name: [Phenomena] Turquoise twill scarflette dress Sample Sale
description: Size 4 US turquoise blue twill dress with attached scarflette.Created in 2010. Worn twice for fashion shows. Fully lined in dark green acetate lining. Shows little to no signs of wear. Price has been discounted due to previous wear & adjustments noted below. **Note** The metal zipper was replaced with plastic due to some issues with lining getting stuck, but there are no needle marks & lining pieces were also replaced. Suitable for work wear. Belt not included. ***Measurements*** Bust - 34" Waist - 24" Hip - 35" For reference, model is 5'8" tall.

name: [Phenomena] Bloodstain. SZ 4 US sample sale
description:
Seafoam blue silk dupioni overbust corset made in 2010. Worn once by model for below photoshoot. Has a hand-embroidered bloodstain on left side (photoshopped out of below photo) with blood red seed beads in French Couture style. Fully boned using 1/2" flat & spring steel boning.

This is a *real* corset & will reduce waist by 2"-4", but it is NOT recommended that this piece be used for tightlacing (reducing waist more than 6") as wearing a non-custom corset may cause serious discomfort. - Details - External Fabric: Seafoam blue 100% silk dupioni Lining - White 100% cotton herringbone coutil Steel front busk 4 Tipped spring steel boning at bust double-boned seams w/ flat steel boning Lace-up back (grommets & washers) reinforced with 1/2" flat steel bones Comes with back lacing protector in same fabric & 8' of Black cotton flat lacing. Measurements: 36 B-C bust 20" waist - best for a waist between 22"-24" 36" hip Normally an embroidered piece starts at $1,100. This piece is discounted due to previous wear & some tailor markings on inside. Please inquire if you would prefer a customized piece.
